item.title: Lost Clarity
item.description: Why do the hard things still feel so hard to do. I know that I procrastinate a lot and I still give up on 80% of my projects. Because they are hard. There are too many unknowns. There is no clear direction and I feel lost. This is the hardest thing for me to find a way when there is no clear path. Which makes me think if there is ever a clear path.
